resources.string: How do I submit my work?
You can submit your projects on our portal: c2c.acmvit.in/projects
Who will own the Intellectual Property Rights of the product developed by my team?

The Intellectual Property Rights belong solely to your team until your team decides to enter into an agreement with a third party company in which case the Intellectual Property Rights will be divided equally between the company(Party 1) and your team(Party 2).
How many reviews will be there?
here will be two elimination rounds - On 8th and 9th respectively. The top 6 teams will get a chance to present their hack in the final Expo.
What is the weightage of each review?

For the 1st review we will make note of your chosen track with understanding and innovation you have shown related to the chosen problem statement. The 2nd review is a technical review where you will be judged based on your implementation.
Yes you will get loads of yummy food to fill your bellies with!
